Table Version

Table Version

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

head

version

head table version should be 1.0.

head table version is 1.0.

Warning

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

version

OS/2 table version should be 4.

OS/2 table version is '3' but should be 4. Please verify agains job spec.

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

post

format

If not CFF, post table format should be 2.

Post table format is 3.0 but should be 2 (except for CJK fonts). Please investigate.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/post

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0020

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0020.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0x25CC

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0x25CC.

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Error

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True.

Error

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

Panose Italic

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True the OS/2 panose array form flag should be an 'Oblique' entry.

'OS/2' panose array form flag is not 'Oblique'. Please investigate.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0020

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0020.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0x25CC

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0x25CC.

Error

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Error

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

OS/2

usWeightClass

OS/2 usWeightClass should be 700 if NID 2 contains 'Bold'.

'OS/2' table usWeightClass is 700.

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

'OS/2' panose array form flag is not 'Oblique'. Please investigate.

fvar table

fvar table

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

static font

More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni0000 is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Kokila', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila', Everything looks good.

Pass

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

NID (3, 1, 1027, 2)

'name' table language is Unknown.

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1027, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Catalan/Subfamily:
'Normal'

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 2

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Normal'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Warning

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2

Entry: 'Normal'
The keyword 'Normal' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 2

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Catalan' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Normal' ≠ 'Regular'.

Error

NID 6 is 'Kokila', Everything looks good.

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

NID (3, 1, 1034, 2)

'name' table language is Unknown.

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1034, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Spanish (Traditional Sort)/Subfamily:
'Normal'

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Spanish (Traditional Sort)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Normal' ≠ 'Regular'.

Error

MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Critical

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2011, Modular Infotech, Pune, INDIA. - Licenced to Microsoft'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'Kokila-Italic'

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

'Bold Italic'

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2011, Modular Infotech, Pune, INDIA. - Licenced to Microsoft'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '13'
'Kokila-Italic'

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2011, Modular Infotech, Pune, INDIA. - Licenced to Microsoft'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '11'
'Kokila-Bold'

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

Info

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2011, Modular Infotech, Pune, INDIA. - Licenced to Microsoft'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '11'
'Kokila-Bold'

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

name

(3, 1, 1034, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Spanish (Traditional Sort)/Subfamily:

but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

name

NID 2 is not the same 'Negrita' ≠ 'Bold'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Fet' ≠ 'Bold'.

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Error

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (MS/BMP/Spanish (Mexico)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Critical

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2011, Modular Infotech, Pune, INDIA. - Licenced to Microsoft'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'Kokila-BoldItalic'

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Kokila-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2011, Modular Infotech, Pune, INDIA. - Licenced to Microsoft'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '6'
'Kokila'

Pass

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

name

MS NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Semi, Extra, Ex, Demi, Sm, Dm, Ultra, Xtra, X'

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Kokila Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Kokila' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

Pass

'Kokila Bold Italic'

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 6.90;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 6.9'.

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'Kokila-BoldItalic'

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Kokila-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Kokila-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'BoldItalic'

Info

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text.

There is a license text but no manufactur. Please verify agains spec.
The license text is:
Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.

Error

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

NID (3, 1, 1034, 2)

'name' table language is Unknown.

The name table test is limited. This name table needs to be checked by human.
(3, 1, 1034, 2) ==> MS/BMP/Spanish (Traditional Sort)/Subfamily:
'Negrita Cursiva'

Error

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 2

MS NID 2, Subfamily.

NID 2 is 'Negrita Cursiva'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Error

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

name

MS NID 2

NID 2 'MS/BMP/Spanish (Traditional Sort)' should match 'MS/BMP/English (U.S.)'.

NID 2 is not the same 'Negrita Cursiva' ≠ 'Bold Italic'.

Error

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

name

Windows NID 17 (MS/BMP/Italian (Italy))

Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Windows NID 17 (MS/BMP/Basque)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 17, Typographic Subfamily Name' (MS/BMP/Basque)

Typographic Subfamily Name NID 17 (MS/BMP/Basque) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Underline Position and Thickness

Underline Position and Thickness

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-394'.
underlineThicknes is '122'.

Pass

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-394'.
underlineThicknes is '122'.

underlineThicknes is '122'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Error

kern

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1441) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

hhea

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 1504
hhea.descent: -857
hhea.lineGap: 0

hhea

lineGap

Vertical Metrics 'lineGap' shouldn't be negative.

lineGap = '0'.

gasp Table

gasp Table

Error

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 0

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

gasp

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '8'

Do gray = True

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

head

lowestRecPPEM

Monotype standard for lowestRecPPEM is '9'.

lowestRecPPEM is '9', but should be '9'

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

gasp

subtable

gasp subtable value should be one less than lowestRecPPEM (head table).

gasp subtable is '8' and should be '8'.
(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

Pass

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

gasp

subtable

Monotype standard for gasp table.

gasp subtable '8' is
'Do gray = True'
equal to MT standard
'Do gray = True, Symmetric smoothing = True'

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

subtable

Pull gasp subtable: '26'

Grid-fit = True

(head table lowestRecPPEM is '9')

PostScript names

PostScript names

Info

Kokila Regular (Kokila.TTF)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.

Info

Kokila Italic (Kokilai.TTF)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.

Info

Kokila Bold (Kokilab.TTF)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.

Info

Kokila Bold Italic (Kokilabi.TTF)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.
